A patchwork of humanoid flesh makes up this grotesque mask stitched together with black silk or wire. It is distinctive for its bulbous orange eye- crafted from a magical glass bauble-and wide row of teeth.

When worn, the mask amplifies your ability to sense fear in other creatures.

You automatically know the value of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition of any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{Observed} creature, and you gain a +1 item bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} frightened creatures. Whenever you deal precision damage to a frightened creature, you deal 1 additional precision damage.

If you are not evil, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} while wearing the Skinsaw mask.

action->Wire Catch.name: Wire Catch
action->Wire Catch.description:
Every Skinsaw seamer keeps a sewing needle attached to a loop of thick silk, wrapped loosely around their hand not holding a weapon, which they can use in combat to snag or disarm attackers

Trigger A creature hits the seamer with a melee Strike

Effect The seamer attempts an Athletics check to either [[/act grapple]] or [[/act disarm]] the triggering creature.

action->Flay.name: Flay
action->Flay.description:
Requirements The Skinsaw seamer dealt damage with a melee weapon other than its war razor with their last action

Effect The seamer makes a war razor Strike against the same creature that they just damaged. On a hit, the seamer slices a strip of flesh from the target and deals @Damage[1d6[bleed]] in addition to the war razor's usual damage.

action->Quick Stitch.name: Quick Stitch
action->Quick Stitch.description:
Requirements The Skinsaw seamer is currently grappling a creature

Effect The seamer stitches a piece of cloth to the creature's arm, face, or leg, potentially hindering it. The creature must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:26|traits:damaging-effect] saving throw; if the seamer has already successfully used their Flay ability against the creature within the past minute, the creature's save result is one degree of success worse.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes @Damage[1d4[piercing]] damage.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} (seamer's choice). This effect lasts until the creature spends a single action to tear out the stitching, which deals @Damage[1d6[piercing]] damage to it.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, or off-guard (seamer's choice). This effect lasts until the creature spends 2 actions to tear out the stitching, which deals @Damage[2d6[piercing]] damage to it.

action->Pest Haven.name: Pest Haven
action->Pest Haven.description:
The rotting hides and molding straw stuffing of skitterstitches are ideal nesting grounds for vermin and insect swarms. Any animal swarm sharing a space with a skitterstitch gains fast healing 3.

Additionally, if a creature deals at least 10 piercing or slashing damage to the skitterstitchstitch, the swarm can use its swarming bites Strike (or similar attack) against the attacker as a reaction.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.CM14G9kLI97aIC5h]{Effect: Pest Haven}

action->Spider Swarm Host.name: Spider Swarm Host
action->Spider Swarm Host.description: Skitterstitches host a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.NcYbJS5PWBGdNDqh]{Spider Swarm} within themselves, which erupts out when the Skitterstitch is destroyed

action->Flay.name: Flay
action->Flay.description: The skitterstitch makes a blade Strike against an animal or humanoid. On a success, the skitterstitch slices a long strip of flesh from the target; if the skitterstitch dealt damage, it deals an additional 1d6 persistent bleed damage.

action->Skitterstitch Venom.name: Skitterstitch Venom
action->Skitterstitch Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:23|traits:poison]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[1d10[poison]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[1d10[poison]] damage, off-guard, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} (1 round)

action->Stitch Skin.name: Stitch Skin
action->Stitch Skin.description:
Requirements The skitterstitch hasn't used this ability since the last time it successfully used its Flay ability

Effect The skitterstitch sews flayed flesh to its body to seal tears and rents. The skitterstitch regains @Damage[8[healing]] Hit Points.

weapon->Composite Shortbow.name: Composite Shortbow
weapon->Composite Shortbow.description: This shortbow is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Its compact size and power make it a favorite of mounted archers. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a shortbow, it also applies to composite shortbows unless otherwise stated.

weapon->Sap.name: Sap
weapon->Sap.description: A sap has a soft wrapping around a dense core, typically a leather sheath around a lead rod. Its head is wider than its grip to disperse the force of a blow, as the weapon's purpose is to knock out its victim rather than to draw blood.

weapon->+1 Striking Temple Sword.name: +1 Tempelschwert des Schadens
weapon->+1 Striking Temple Sword.description: This heavy blade is favored by guardians of religious sites. It has a distinctive, crescent-shaped blade that seems to be a mix of a sickle and sword. It often has holes drilled into the blade or the pommel so that bells or other holy trinkets can be affixed to the weapon as an aid for prayer or mediation.

shield->Steel Shield.name: Steel Shield
shield->Steel Shield.description:
Like wooden shields, steel shields come in a variety of shapes and sizes. Though more expensive than wooden shields, they are much more durable.

Hardness HP BT
5 20 10

armor->Chain Mail.name: Chain Mail
armor->Chain Mail.description: A suit of chain mail consists of several pieces of armor composed of small metal rings linked together in a protective mesh. It typically includes a chain shirt, leggings, a pair of arms, and a coif, collectively protecting most of the body.

consumable->Arrows.name: Arrows
consumable->Arrows.description: These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.

action->Attack of Opportunity.name: Attack of Opportunity
action->Attack of Opportunity.description:
Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

action->Wary.name: Wary
action->Wary.description: The veteran isn't off-guard to hidden creatures and always gains a +4 circumstance bonus to their Perception DC against creatures attempting to Create a Diversion or Lie to the veteran.

action->Power Attack.name: Power Attack
action->Power Attack.description: The veteran makes a melee Strike that counts as two attacks when calculating their multiple attack penalty. If this strike hits, it deals an extra die of weapon damage.

action->Swipe.name: Swipe
action->Swipe.description: The veteran makes a melee Strike and compares the attack roll result to the AC of up to two foes, each of whom must be within their melee reach and adjacent to each other. Roll damage only once and apply it to each creature hit. A Swipe counts as two attacks for the veteran's multiple attack penalty.

action->Tremorsense (Imprecise) 120 feet.name:
<Compendium> tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.j2wsK6IsW5yMW1jW]
Tremorsense (Imprecise) 120 feet

action->Transparent.name: Transparent
action->Transparent.description:
A slithering rift is so clear that it's difficult to spot. A successful @Check[perception|dc:48] check is required to notice a stationary slithering rift, and a creature must be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Searching} to attempt this check.

A creature that walks into the rift's space might fall into any pit currently in effect due to Dimensional Pit.

action->Breach Vulnerability.name: Breach Vulnerability
action->Breach Vulnerability.description:
Ingesting an extradimensional space like that found in a bag of holding deals @Damage[12d8[force]] damage to the slithering rift and its occupants.

The slithering rift then immediately uses Out You Go.

action->Dimensional Pit.name: Dimensional Pit
action->Dimensional Pit.description:
The slithering rift opens an extradimensional, 20-foot-deep pit that covers its own space and all adjacent squares unless they are walls or similarly blocking terrain.

Any other creature occupying spaces in the pit must succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:40|traits:damaging-effect] save or fall into the pit, taking damage from the fall (typically @Damage[10[bludgeoning]|options:fall-damage] damage). Any creature grabbed by the ooze is released from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.i18TlebMzwONyPhI]{Grab} and falls in, even if it was outside the pit squares.

While the pit is open, the slithering rift is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and can't be forced to move. It can make pseudopod Strikes originating from the walls of the pit. A creature that starts its turn at the bottom of the pit takes @Damage[5d6[acid]] damage.

Creatures can climb the walls with a @Check[athletics|dc:40|name:Climb Out of the Rift|traits:action:climb] check. When the slithering rift dies, the pit closes and creatures inside are ejected, as Out you Go.

action->Flurry of Pods.name: Flurry of Pods
action->Flurry of Pods.description:
The slithering rift makes a single pseudopod Strike against each target within range it hasn't already @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.

These attacks count toward the slithering rift's multiple attack penalty, but this penalty doesn't increase until after all of these attacks.

action->Out You Go.name: Out You Go
action->Out You Go.description:
The slithering rift closes all pit spaces it created using Dimensional Pit, ejecting all its occupants onto the ground into random free spaces where the opening of the pit was.

Each occupant takes @Damage[9d6[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:40|basic] save).

Sordesdaemon.name: Sordesdaemon
Sordesdaemon.saveDetails: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

action->Telepathy 100 feet.name:
<Compendium> tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.kdhbPaBMK1d1fpbA]
Telepathy 100 feet

action->Miasma of Pollution.name: Miasma of Pollution
action->Miasma of Pollution.description:
30 feet. Creatures in the aura can't reduce the value of the sickened condition.

A creature that enters the aura or begins its turn in it must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:34] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} (plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} as long as it is sickened on a critical failure).

A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Creatures made of water (such as water elementals) and plant creatures use an outcome one degree of success worse than the result of their save.

action->Pollution Infusion.name: Pollution Infusion
action->Pollution Infusion.description:
Non-fiend creatures adjacent to the afflicted creature take a -1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against disease

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:36]

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (1 day)

Stage 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (1 week)

Stage 5 dead.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.gORyINQLvplfthlm]{Effect: Pollution Infusion}

action->Retch of Foulness.name: Retch of Foulness
action->Retch of Foulness.description:
The sordesdaemon exhales a spray of sewage that deals @Damage[8d6[acid],8d6[poison]|options:area-damage]{8d6 acid damage and 8d6 poison damage} in a @Template[cone|distance:30] (@Check[fortitude|dc:40|basic|options:area-effect] save).

It can't use Retch of Foulness again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Retch of Foulness]]{1d4 rounds}.

weapon->+1 Striking Crossbow.name: +1 Armbrust des Schadens
weapon->+1 Striking Crossbow.description: Diese Fernkampfwaffe besteht aus einer bogenartigen Wurfarmkonstruktion, welche auf einen hölzernen Schaft montiert wurde. Dieser besitzt einen Mechanismus mit Abzug, in welchen die Bogensehne eingehakt werden kann. Zum Abschießen eines Bolzens wird dann dieser Abzug betätigt und die Spannung von Sehne und Wurfarmen gelöst.

weapon->Thunderstone (Greater).name: Aufgeladener Starker Sprengstein
weapon->Thunderstone (Greater).description:
Wenn dieser Stein auf eine Kreatur oder eine harte Oberfläche aufschlägt, explodiert er mit einem ohrenbetäubenden Knall. Ein Sprengstein verursacht den aufgeführten Schallschaden und Schallflächenschaden, und jede Kreatur in einem Umkreis von 10 Fuß/3 m des Ortes, an dem der Stein explodiert ist, muss einen Zähigkeitswurf gegen den aufgeführten SG ablegen; bei einem Fehlschlag erleidet sie bis zum Ende ihres nächsten Zuges den Zustand Taub.

Du erhältst einen Gegenstandsbonus von +2 auf Angriffswürfe. Die Bombe verursacht 3W4 Punkte Schallschaden und 3 Punkte Schallflächenschaden, und der SG liegt bei 28.

weapon->+1 Striking Longsword.name: +1 Langschwert des Schadens
weapon->+1 Striking Longsword.description: Langschwerter können ein oder zweischneidig sein. Ihre Klingen sind schwer und 0,90-1,20 m lang.

armor->Chain Shirt.name: Chain Shirt
armor->Chain Shirt.description: Sometimes called a hauberk, this is a long shirt constructed of the same metal rings as chainmail. However, it is much lighter than chainmail and protects only the torso, upper arms, and upper legs of its wearer.

consumable->Bolts.name: Bolzen
consumable->Bolts.description: Bolzen sind kürzer als normale Pfeile, diesen ansonsten aber sehr ähnlich. Sie werden als Munition für Armbrüste benutzt.

action->Binding Blast.name: Binding Blast
action->Binding Blast.description: A commando's thunderstone is infused with special reagents to produce a blinding flash of light. In addition to the thunderstone's normal effects, creatures that fail the saving throw against the thunderstone are also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round. Creatures that critically fail are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round. Creatures who protect their eyes, such as by wearing tinted goggles, are immune to the infused thunderstone's blinding effect.

action->Target Culprit.name: Target Culprit
action->Target Culprit.description: The commando designates a single creature as their culprit. The commando gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} their culprit and a +2 circumstance bonus to Survival checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} their culprit. The commando's attacks deal an additional 2d8 precision damage to the culprit. This designation lasts for 24 hours or until the commando targets another creature with this ability.

Summoning Rune (Barbazu Devil).name: Summoning Rune (Barbazu Devil)
Summoning Rune (Barbazu Devil).description: A summoning circle inlaid into the room's floor detects living creatures and summons a violent devil.
Summoning Rune (Barbazu Devil).disable: @Check[perception|dc:18|name:Notice the Trap's Magic|traits:action:seek] to notice the trap's magic and avoid stepping on the floor outside the circle, followed by @Check[thievery|dc:21|name:Break Summoning Circle|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) to break the circle or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (3rd rank; counteract DC 23) to counteract the rune
Summoning Rune (Barbazu Devil).reset: The trap resets each day at dawn.

action->Summon Devil.name: Summon Devil
action->Summon Devil.description:
Trigger A living creature steps on any part of the floor not enclosed by the summoning circle

Effect One round after a creature touches the triggering area, the door to the room slams shut and locks (two [[/act pick-a-lock dc=20]]{Thievery} checks to pick) and a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.FIoRPHaHdYUPVKdT]{Barbazu} devil appears in the summoning circle.

The devil rolls initiative and remains for [[/br 3d6 #rounds]]{3d6 rounds}, after which the spell ends and the devil disappears. The devil also disappears if someone disables the trap before the duration expires.

The summoned devil can use 3 actions each round and can use reactions, unlike most summoned creatures.

Summoning Rune (Cinder Rat).name: Summoning Rune (Cinder Rat)
Summoning Rune (Cinder Rat).description: An invisible cloud of magical sensors detects living creatures in the room and summons fire elementals to slay the creatures.
Summoning Rune (Cinder Rat).disable: @Check[acrobatics|dc:22|name:Approach Rune] (trained) to approach without triggering the trap, followed by @Check[thievery|dc:22|name:Erase Summoning Rune|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) to erase the rune or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (3rd rank; counteract DC 20) to counteract the rune
Summoning Rune (Cinder Rat).reset: The trap resets each day at dawn.

action->Summon Elementals.name: Summon Elementals
action->Summon Elementals.description:
Trigger A living creature enters the room

Effect Two rounds after a creature enters the room, the room's door slams shut and locks (two [[/act pick-a-lock dc=20]]{Thievery} checks to pick), and two @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.xN5J9S485LxFZMkL]{Cinder Rat} fire elementals emerge from the floor.

The elementals roll initiative and remain for [[/gmr 3d6 #rounds]]{3d6 rounds}, after which the spell ends and the creatures disappear. The elementals also disappear if someone disables the trap before the duration expires.

The summoned elementals can use 3 actions each round and can use reactions, unlike most summoned creatures.

Supplicant Statues.name: Supplicant Statues
Supplicant Statues.description: Six statues rapidly slide around the room on rollers, slowing down intruders and striking at them with spring-loaded sword arms.
Supplicant Statues.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:34|name:Disable Statue Rollers|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to disable a specific statue's rollers, or @Check[thievery|dc:39|name:Disable Trap (Control Panel)|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) on the control panel in A4 deactivates the whole trap. For each statue disabled, the trap loses 1 action from its routine and the DC for its predictive impediment ability decreases by 4. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (7th rank, counteract DC 32) doesn't harm the statues but removes the predictive impediment ability. Breaking the control panel prevents the trap from resetting.
Supplicant Statues.reset: The trap deactivates and resets one minute after the room is empty.
Supplicant Statues.routine: (6 actions) On the trap's initiative, each functioning statue slides up to 40 feet around the room and makes a statue shortsword Strike against an adjacent creature. The trap doesn't take a multiple attack penalty, and the statues' movements don't trigger reactions.

action->Animated Statues.name: Animated Statues
action->Animated Statues.description:
Trigger A creature enters a square adjacent to a statue

Effect The trap makes a statue shortsword Strike against the triggering creature, activates its predictive impediment ability, and then rolls initiative.

action->Predictive Impediment.name: Predictive Impediment
action->Predictive Impediment.description: The statues continually slide around to bump into creatures and block their passage through the room. The first time on its turn that a creature attempts to move within the room, it must succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:36] save or treat the entire room as difficult terrain for 1 round. On a critical failure, the creature is also knocked prone.

spell->Produce Flame.name: Flammen erzeugen
spell->Produce Flame.description:
Ein kleiner Ball aus Flammen erscheint in deiner Handfläche. Du kannst damit Nahkampf- oder Fernkampfangriffe durchführen. Führe einen Zauberangriffswurf gegen die RK des Zieles aus. Für gewöhnlich ist dies ein Fernkampfangriff, aber du darfst auch einen Angriff gegen eine Kreatur innerhalb deines Waffenlosen Angriffsradius durchführen.

Erfolg Du verursachst 2W4 Punkte Feuerschaden. Bei einem kritischen Erfolg erleidet das Ziel doppelten Schaden sowie 1W4 Punkte Anhaltenden Feuerschaden.

Erhöhung (+1) Der Schaden erhöht sich um 1W4. Der anhaltende Schaden bei einem Kritischen Erfolg erhöht sich um 1W4.

Gradabhängiger Anhaltender Feuerschaden: @Damage[(@item.level)d4[persistent,fire]]

action->Shadow Step.name: Shadow Step
action->Shadow Step.description:
The svartalfar killer fades into shadow, Strides up to twice its Speed, and reforms.

This movement doesn't trigger reactions, but the svartalfar killer must begin and end in an area of dim light or darkness.

action->Sneak Attack.description: Ein Svartalf-Mörder verursacht gegenüber Kreaturen @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Auf dem Falschen Fuß} zusätzlich 2W6 Präzisionsschaden.

action->Spell-Imbued Blade.name: Spell-Imbued Blade
action->Spell-Imbued Blade.description:
The svartalfar killer chooses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gISYsBFby1TiXfBt]{Acid Splash}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6DfLZBl8wKIV03Iq]{Ignition}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.J7Y7tl0bbdz7TcCc]{Enfeeble}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp} and makes a melee Strike.

If the svartalfar killer hits, they cast the chosen spell through the weapon at the same target. The spell's attack roll is the same result as the Strike.

action->Obscuring Grab.name: Obscuring Grab
action->Obscuring Grab.description: While the tenome is Grabbing a creature, all other creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to the tenome.

action->Bone Drink.name: Bone Drink
action->Bone Drink.description:
Requirement The tenome has a creature grabbed or restrained

Effect The tenome makes a jaws Strike against the grabbed or restrained creature. If the Strike hits, the creature must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:18] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (or the value of the creature's drained condition increases by 1 if it already has a drained value, to a maximum of drained 4).

The tenome regains @Damage[1d8[healing]] Hit Points each time it uses Bone Drink.

action->Burst of Speed.name: Burst of Speed
action->Burst of Speed.description:
The tenome Strides twice, Steps twice, or Steps and Strides (in either order).

It cannot use Burst of Speed again for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

action->Terrifying Gaze.name: Terrifying Gaze
action->Terrifying Gaze.description:
1 or 2 actions

A tenome can gaze at a creature within 30 feet by presenting one of its eyes. The target must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:21] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}. If the tenome uses 2 actions and presents both of its eyes, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} if it fails the save.

A creature that successfully saves is temporarily immune for 24 hours.

action->Emotion Sense 120 feet.name: Emotion Sense 120 feet
action->Emotion Sense 120 feet.description: A teraphant can sense the emotions of creatures within 120 feet as an imprecise sense. Emotion sense is a precise sense against creatures under an emotion effect. A creature under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.b515AZlB0sridKSq]{Calm} can't be noticed via emotion sense.

action->Empathetic Response.name: Empathetic Response
action->Empathetic Response.description:
Trigger A creature within 60 feet of the teraphant is targeted by a spell or ability with the emotion trait

Effect The teraphant also benefits from the spell or effect, as though it were an additional target for 1 minute or until the triggering spell or ability ends.

action->Impale.name: Impale
action->Impale.description:
Requirement The teraphant has a creature grabbed

Effect The teraphant slams the creature onto one of its horns. The target must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:27|basic] save or suffer @Damage[(3d6+9)[piercing]] damage and @Damage[1d6[bleed]] (@Damage[(6d6+18)[piercing]] damage on a critical failure).

action->Psychokinetic Trumpet.name: Psychokinetic Trumpet
action->Psychokinetic Trumpet.description:
The teraphant lets out a loud trumpet that deals @Damage[8d8[mental]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[will|dc:27|basic|options:area-effect,inflicts:forced-movement] save) in a @Template[cone|distance:30]. A creature that fails its save is also pushed 15 feet (30 feet on a critical failure).

If a pushed creatures strikes a solid barrier, it takes @Damage[3d6[bludgeoning]] damage and stops.

The teraphant can't use Psychokinetic Trumpet again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Psychokinetic Trumpet]]{1d4 rounds}.

action->Trample.description:
tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.UNah0bxXxkcZjxO3]

Large or smaller, foot, @Check[reflex|dc:27|basic]

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Trample]

action->Grabbing Trunk.name: Grabbing Trunk
action->Grabbing Trunk.description: A Medium or smaller creature hit by the teraphant's trunk is grabbed. If the teraphant moves, it can bring the grabbed creature along with it.

The Inkmaster.name: The Inkmaster
The Inkmaster.publicNotes:
Shemhazians rise from the souls of torturers and those who reveled in mutilating the physical bodies of their victims. Standing 35 feet tall, a shemhazian is well equipped with a wide range of talons, claws, and fangs to continue inflicting such torments on those it encounters.

Shemhazians delight in visiting torment upon mortals, of course, but more than most demons, these fiends revel in sharing the pain with their own kind. Other demons fear and hate shemhazians for this reason, with only the most powerful willing to work with a shemhazian to achieve a shared goal. Even then, the shemhazian is always on the watch for an opportunity to bring pain and suffering to its allies along with any foe.
The Inkmaster.saveDetails: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

action->Clockwork Brain.name: Clockwork Brain
action->Clockwork Brain.description: A second brain, made of clockwork, is implanted in the Inkmaster's skull. Any time he makes a Will save, he rolls twice and takes the higher result.

action->Paralyzing Gaze.name: Paralyzing Gaze
action->Paralyzing Gaze.description: 30 feet. A non-evil creature that ends its turn in the aura must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:35] save. If it fails, it's slowed 1 for 1 round, and if it critically fails, it is instead paralyzed for 1 round.

action->Succor Vulnerability.name: Succor Vulnerability
action->Succor Vulnerability.description: A shemhazian's mutilation is a part of them, and they can't bear to see it reversed. The first time each round that a creature heals from damage the shemhazian dealt on their last turn, the demon takes @Damage[3d6[mental]] damage.

action->Tail Whip.name: Tail Whip
action->Tail Whip.description:
Trigger A creature within reach of the shemhazian's tail leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The shemhazian attempts to Trip the triggering creature. On a success, the creature also takes damage as if the shemhazian had hit with a tail Strike, and if the creature was flying, it falls 30 feet.

action->Enfeebling Bite.name: Enfeebling Bite
action->Enfeebling Bite.description: If the shemhazian's jaws Strike damages a creature, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3}. The target can attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:37] save to reduce this to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (or be unaffected on a critical success).

action->Focused Gaze.name: Focused Gaze
action->Focused Gaze.description: The shemhazian focuses their gaze on a non-evil creature they can see within 30 feet. If that creature isn't already slowed by the shemhazian's paralyzing gaze, it must attempt a save against the shemhazian's paralyzing gaze. If that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed}, it must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:35] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round. A shemhazian can't use this ability against the same creature more than once per round.

action->Improved Grab.name: Improved Grab
action->Improved Grab.description:
Requirements The monster's last action was a success with a Strike that lists Improved Grab in its damage entry, or it has a creature grabbed using this action.

Effect The monster automatically Grabs the target until the end of the monster's next turn. The creature is grabbed by whichever body part the monster attacked with, and that body part can't be used to Strike creatures until the grab is ended. Using Improved Grab extends the duration of the monster's Improved Grab until the end of its next turn for all creatures grabbed by it, but this costs an action. A grabbed creature can use the Escape action to get out of the grab, and the Grab ends for a grabbed creatures if the monster moves away from it.

The Laughing Fiend's Greeting.name: The Laughing Fiend's Greeting
The Laughing Fiend's Greeting.description: Subtle but deadly magical runes link this mural to Kharnas's master. Good- or neutral-aligned creatures who examine the mural witness the castle's drawbridge silently descend, revealing an endless darkness.
The Laughing Fiend's Greeting.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:44|name:Disable Thievery] (legendary) to obscure or mar the magical runes set into the mural, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th rank; counteract DC 42) to counteract the mural

action->Tegresin's Greeting.name: Tegresin's Greeting
action->Tegresin's Greeting.description:
Trigger A creature capable of casting divine magic examines the mural

Effect The mural casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qDjeG6dxT4aEEC6J]{Weird} (@Check[will|dc:43|traits:death,emotion,fear,illusion,mental,damaging-effect] save) on all creatures in the gallery. A snarl fills the creatures' minds.

spell->Inveigle.target: 1 Kreatur, deren Stufe den doppelten Zaubergrad dieses Rituals nicht übertreffen darf

weapon->Blade of the Rabbit Prince.name: Klinge des Hasenfürsten
weapon->Blade of the Rabbit Prince.description:
Dieses +2 Tanzende Kurzschwert des Starken Schadens zeichnet sich durch seinen goldenen Schwertgriff aus, der einem Vogel mit ausgestreckten Flügeln ähnelt. Die Klinge des Schwertes ist auf halber Länge abgebrochen, was die Funktion der Klinge des Hasenfürsten jedoch in keiner Weise beeinträchtigt.

Aktivierung 1 Befehlswort, Interagieren

Effekt Beim Ausführen eines Manövers zum Entwaffnen oder Zu Fall Bringen deines Gegners nutzt du die Fertigkeit Diebeskunst anstelle von Athletik. Zudem kannst du den Gegenstandsbonus der Klinge des Hasenfürsten zu diesem Wurf addieren. Du musst dafür keine Hand frei haben, wenn du die Klinge des Hasenfürsten führst. Zudem kann dein Ziel bis zu zwei Größenkategorien größer sein als du selbst.

Herstellungsvoraussetzungen Du musst die Klinge des Hasenfürsten im Turmkartenreich herstellen.

weapon->Hardened Harrow Deck.name: Verstärkte Turmkarten
weapon->Hardened Harrow Deck.description:
Das Turmkartenspiel ist ein traditionelles Kartenlegerdeck, das von varisischen Wahrsagern verwendet wird. Die Verstärkten Turmkarten sind eine magische Version des Decks aus Schicksalsdeutungskarten. Es besteht aus dünnen Metallkarten, die mit all den Bildern verziert wurden, die auch in den gewöhnlichen Turmkartendecks zu finden sind. Lediglich das Design wirkt etwas kantiger. Du kannst Karten aus dem Verstärkten Turmkartendeck als +2 Pfeile des Starken Schadens mit der Kategorie Gefährlich W10 schleudern. Eine Karte, die als Waffe eingesetzt wurde, wird dabei nicht zerstört. Sofern die Karte nicht in das Deck zurückgerufen werden kann (siehe dazu den Eintrag Aktivierung des Decks), kann sie durch Aufwenden von 1 Minute zum Suchen wiedergefunden werden. Fehlt allerdings auch nur eine einzige Karte aus dem Turmkartendeck, kann es nicht mehr für eine traditionelle Schicksalsdeutung verwendet werden.

Solange du mehr als die Hälfte der Karten in deinem Verstärkten Turmkartendeck bei dir hast, wird jeder Erfolg bei einem Rettungswurf gegen Furchteffekte als Kritischer Erfolg behandelt. Verfügst du bereits über eine andere Fähigkeit, die einen Erfolg bei einem Rettungswurf gegen einen Furchteffekt zu einem Kritischen Erfolg verbessert, erhältst du stattdessen einen Situationsbonus von +1 auf Rettungswürfe gegen Furchteffekte.

Aktivierung 1 Befehlswort, Interagieren

Effekt Sämtliche Karten des Verstärkten Turmkartendecks, die sich innerhalb einer Reichweite von 60 Fuß/18 m von dir befinden und die du sehen kannst, fliegen zurück in das Kartendeck.

action->Halfling Luck.name: Halfling Luck
action->Halfling Luck.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger The Rabbit Prince fails a skill check or a saving throw

Effect The Rabbit Prince rerolls the triggering check, but he must use the new result, even if it's worse.

action->Perfect Will.name: Perfect Will
action->Perfect Will.description: If the Rabbit Prince rolls a success on a Will save, he gets a critical success instead, and if he rolls a critical failure, he gets a failure instead.

action->Superior Senses.name: Superior Senses
action->Superior Senses.description: The Rabbit Prince automatically critically succeeds at Seek actions to find hidden or undetected creatures within 30 feet and at flat checks to target creatures within 30 feet that are concealed or hidden from him.

action->Bloody Jab.name: Bloody Jab
action->Bloody Jab.description: Whenever the Rabbit Prince deals piercing damage, he also deals 2d10 persistent bleed damage.

action->Darting Flurry.name: Darting Flurry
action->Darting Flurry.description: The Rabbit Prince Strides and makes a blade of the Rabbit Prince Strike and a harrow card Strike at any point during the Stride. His multiple attack penalty increases only after both attacks.

action->Quick Movements.name: Quick Movements
action->Quick Movements.description: The Rabbit Prince doesn't trigger reactions with his movement or with any use of the Thievery skill.

action->Telepathy 100 Feet.name:
<Compendium> tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.kdhbPaBMK1d1fpbA]
Telepathy 100 Feet

action->+2 Status to All Saves vs. Menta.name:
<Compendium> tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.kquBnQ0kObZztnBc]
+2 Status to All Saves vs. Mental

action->Attack of Opportunity (Stinger O.name:
<Compendium> tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.hFtNbo1LKYCoDy2O]
Attack of Opportunity (Stinger Only)

action->True Appearance.name: True Appearance
action->True Appearance.description:
Trigger The Stabbing Beast is transformed with Change Shape and rolls for initiative

Effect The Stabbing Beast ends Change Shape.

action->Blinding Stream.name: Blinding Stream
action->Blinding Stream.description: A creature hit by the Stabbing Beast's venom stream must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:33] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for [[/gmr 1d4 #Blinded Duration]]{1d4 rounds}.

action->Change Shape.name: Change Shape
action->Change Shape.description: The Stabbing Beast takes on the appearance of a Medium humanoid with a scorpion's tail and chitinous, full-body plate armor. This doesn't change their Speed or Strikes, except that their reach becomes 5 feet and they can't make pincer Strikes.

action->Conjure Swords.name: Conjure Swords
action->Conjure Swords.description:
Requirements The Stabbing Beast is using Change Shape

Effect The Stabbing Beast summons one or two +2 greater striking keen shortswords into their hands. These weapons disappear if they leave the Stabbing Beast's grasp or if the Stabbing Beast ends Change Shape.

action->Stabbing Beast Venom.name: Stabbing Beast Venom
action->Stabbing Beast Venom.description:
While a creature is enfeebled from this poison, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:36]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[4d6[poison]] damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[6d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3} (1 round)

The Winder.name: The Winder
The Winder.description: A large metallic arm, 20 feet long, is set into the floor. It rotates around the room to wind up nearby clockwork creatures.
The Winder.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:50|name:Deactivate System|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to deactivate the system, or @Check[athletics|dc:40|name:Jam Gears] (legendary) to jam the gears for 1 round
The Winder.reset: The Winder resets as soon as no creatures remain in the room.
The Winder.routine: (1, 2, or 4 actions, depending on the encounter's threat level) The Winder uses each of its actions to Wind clockwork assassins in the room, starting with inactive ones.

action->Wind Up.name: Wind Up
action->Wind Up.description:
Trigger A creature other than the Rumormonger enters the room, or the Rumormonger commands the device to activate

Effect The Winder rolls initiative.

action->Wind.name: Wind
action->Wind.description: The Winder winds a clockwork creature in the room. If the creature is currently inactive, this activates the creature, allowing it to act normally for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. If already active, this instead increases the number of rounds the clockwork creature remains active by 1d4.

Tiderunner Aquamancer.name: Tiderunner Aquamancer
Tiderunner Aquamancer.saveDetails: +1 status to all saves vs. enchantments, -2 to all saves vs. aboleth effects

spell->Disintegrate.target: 1 Kreatur oder nicht am Leib oder in Händen getragener Gegenstand

spell->Light.target: 1 Gegenstand von maximal 1 Last, den entweder niemand oder du oder ein bereitwilliger Verbündeter mit sich führt

weapon->+2 Striking Spear.name: +2 Speer des Schadens
weapon->+2 Striking Spear.description: Der Speer besteht aus einem langen Metallschaft, der in einer Spitze endet. Er kann einhändig als Nahkampfwaffe genutzt oder geworfen werden.

action->Water Shield.name: Water Shield
action->Water Shield.description: The aquamancer is surrounded by a bubble of water that buffers attacks. Each round, the shield absorbs the first 25 damage that would be dealt to the aquamancer. The shield can absorb only bludgeoning, piercing, slashing, acid, cold, and fire damage types. The aquamancer can dismiss or raise their shield by spending a single action.

weapon->Dagger.name: Dolch
weapon->Dagger.description: Diese kleine Klingenwaffe wird in einer Hand gehalten und kann benutzt werden, um im Nahkampf nach einer Kreatur zu stechen. Sie kann auch geworfen werden.

weapon->+2 Greater Striking War Razor.name: +2 Kriegsmesser des starken Schadens
weapon->+2 Greater Striking War Razor.description: Ein Kriegsmesser ist eine übergroße Version eines Rasiermessers. Es ist eine zerbrechliche, aber unglaublich scharfe Waffe, die leicht in einer Tasche oder in einem Ärmel verschwinden kann.

armor->+2 Resilient Studded Leather Armo.name: +2 Beschlagene Lederrüstung des Widerstandes
armor->+2 Resilient Studded Leather Armo.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.

action->Bloody Mayhem.name: Bloody Mayhem
action->Bloody Mayhem.description: Twisted Jack Strides three times. Once per Stride, he can attempt a war razor Strike against a creature in his reach at any point during the Stride; he must make each Strike against a different creature, but he doesn't apply his multiple attack penalty until after making all his Strikes. If any of the Strikes are a critical failure, Bloody Mayhem immediately ends.

action->Close Cutter.name: Close Cutter
action->Close Cutter.description: Whenever Twisted Jack deals slashing damage, the target takes an additional 2d10 persistent bleed damage.

action->Fan of Daggers.name: Fan of Daggers
action->Fan of Daggers.description: Twisted Jack makes three ranged dagger Strikes, each against a separate target; he ignores the multiple attack penalty until after making all three Strikes. On a critical hit, the target takes @Damage[2d10[bleed]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

action->Knife Thrower.name: Knife Thrower
action->Knife Thrower.description: Twisted Jack's ranged dagger Strikes have a range increment of 20 feet instead of 10 feet.

action->Sneak Attack.description:
tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.AWvNPE4U0kEJSL1T]

Twisted Jack deals an additional 3d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} targets.

action->Motion Sense 60 feet.name: Motion Sense 60 feet
action->Motion Sense 60 feet.description: Tyrroicese can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement.

action->Pseudopod Burst.name: Pseudopod Burst
action->Pseudopod Burst.description:
Tyrroicese makes up to three pseudopod strikes, each against a different creature.

Tyrroicese's multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after all these attacks are made.

action->Rallying Call.name: Rallying Call
action->Rallying Call.description:
When Tyrroicese subsumed Corporal Quordein, it gained a perverted form of the commander's ability to rally allies.

The first time Tyrroicese uses this ability, it summons an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.uQBOJfjtzEXvpLQz]{Ochre Jelly}, which leaks out of the ceiling of area D13 and drops to the floor to join the fight, siding with Tyrroicese.

Thereafter, when Tyrroicese uses this ability, any oozes within 60 feet become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 round (the oozes can use their extra action only to Stride) and, if they're not allied with the agents, the oozes ally themselves with Tyrroicese.

action->Stretching Step.name: Stretching Step
action->Stretching Step.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect Tyrroicese forcefully extends a sticky pseudopod, plants it on a wall within 45 feet, and retracts the muscle.

Tyrroicese springs over to a space adjacent to the wall, moving through the intervening squares as normal but ignoring any difficult or greater difficult terrain.

action->Subsume.name: Subsume
action->Subsume.description:
Tyrroicese lifts an adjacent dying creature with its pseudopods and subsumes that creature into its own oozy flesh. The subsumed creature's dying value does not increase, though it can't decrease either.

Tyrroicese regains @Damage[30[healing]] HP and also gains the ability to use one or two of the subsumed creature's special abilities or feats, subject to the GM's discretion.

A creature adjacent to Tyrroicese can extract a subsumed creature by spending 2 actions to attempt a @Check[athletics|dc:29|name:Extract Subsumed Creature] check.

On a success, the subsumed creature is pulled from Tyrroicese and falls into the nearest available space.

Ulressia The Blessed.name: Ulressia The Blessed
Ulressia The Blessed.saveDetails: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

spell->Light.target: 1 Gegenstand von maximal 1 Last, den entweder niemand oder du oder ein bereitwilliger Verbündeter mit sich führt

action->Crystal Sense (Imprecise) 30 fee.name: Crystal Sense (Imprecise) 30 feet
action->Crystal Sense (Imprecise) 30 fee.description: Ulressia automatically detects crystals or crystalline items within 30 feet.

action->Aura of Angry Crystals.name: Aura of Angry Crystals
action->Aura of Angry Crystals.description:
60 feet. Any creature that ends its turn in the aura while in possession of any crystals, gemstones, or other precious stones must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:39|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and is immune to the aura for 1 hour.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature's crystals reverberate with Ulressia's vengeful aura, sharpening at every corner and digging, as if powerfully magnetized, into the creature's flesh.

The creature takes @Damage[4d6[piercing]] damage, plus @Damage[5[void]] damage for every 2,000 gp the crystals are cumulatively worth (maximum 40 damage).

The creature can't discard the crystals until they leave the aura or roll a successful save against it.

Critical Failure As failure, but @Damage[8d6[piercing]] damage, plus @Damage[10[void]] damage for every 2,000 gp of the crystals' value (maximum 80 damage).

Ulressia can deactivate or activate this aura using a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

action->Crystallize Blood.name: Crystallize Blood
action->Crystallize Blood.description:
Ulressia channels her warped powers over crystals through her blade and into a creature's body, partially crystallizing its blood.

Ulressia makes a melee dagger Strike. On a hit, the creature takes damage as normal and must also roll a @Check[fortitude|dc:41] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}, plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

action->Stunning Strike.name: Stunning Strike
action->Stunning Strike.description:
Requirements Ulressia hit a foe earlier this turn with a weapon Strike

Effect Ulressia makes a weapon Strike against the foe. On a success, the foe must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:41] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}. On a critical failure, the foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2} instead.

action->Kiss.name: Kiss
action->Kiss.description: The vargouille kisses an adjacent creature that's asleep, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, exposing it to the vargouille transformation disease.

action->Shriek.name: Shriek
action->Shriek.description:
The vargouille shrieks, its scream so terrible that all non-vargouilles within 60 feet must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:16] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 3 rounds.

The effect ends early for a creature if the vargouille moves out of sight, moves farther than 60 feet from the creature, or attacks the creature with its fangs.

After attempting its save, a creature is immune to that particular vargouille's Shriek for 24 hours.

action->Vargouille Transformation.name: Vargouille Transformation
action->Vargouille Transformation.description:
Exposing the victim to sunlight or any light spell of 3rd level or higher pauses the progression of the disease until the victim is no longer in light.

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:18]

Stage 1 carrier with no effect ([[/gmr 1d6 #hours]] hours)

Stage 2 victim's hair falls out ([[/gmr 1d6 #hours]] hours)

Stage 3 victim's ears grow into leathery wings, tentacles sprout on the chin and scalp, and the teeth become long, pointed fangs (1 day)

Stage 4 victim's mind regresses to a vicious and unintelligent shell of its former self ([[/gmr 1d6 #hours]] hours)

Stage 5 victim's head breaks free of the body (which dies) and becomes a new vargouille

action->Vargouille Venom.name: Vargouille Venom
action->Vargouille Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:18|name:Vargouile Venom]

Stage 1 Damage the victim has taken from vargouille fangs can't be healed magically.

Once all vargouille fang damage has been healed nonmagically, the poison ends.

action->Motion Sense 60 feet.name: Motion Sense 60 feet
action->Motion Sense 60 feet.description: A vaultbreaker ooze can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement.

action->Treasure Sense (Imprecise) 30 fe.name: Treasure Sense (Imprecise) 30 feet
action->Treasure Sense (Imprecise) 30 fe.description: The vaultbreaker ooze's metallic plasm alerts it to the presence of metals with the precious trait (including gold and platinum) within 30 feet.

action->Metallify.name: Metallify
action->Metallify.description:
Trigger A creature Strikes the vaultbreaker ooze

Effect The ooze's outer plasm hardens into a protective shell of precious metals. Until the start of its next turn, it gains resistance 5 to physical damage (except adamantine), it has a –5-foot penalty to its Speed, and its pseudopod Strikes gain the versatile S or P weapon trait.

action->Engulf.description:
tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.zU3Ovaet4xQ5Gmvy]

@Check[reflex|dc:23|traits:damaging-effect], @Damage[(2d8+9)[acid]] damage, [[/act escape dc=23]], Rupture 14 (19 when using Metallify)

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Engulf]

action->Form Tool.name: Form Tool
action->Form Tool.description: The vaultbreaker ooze instinctually shapes its pseudopod into a key, lockpick, or tool required to bypass a locking mechanism; it uses this pseudopod as thieves' tools to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2EE4aF4SZpYf0R6H]{Pick a Lock} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]{Disable a Device}.

Veksciralenix.name: Veksciralenix
Veksciralenix.saveDetails: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

spell->Plane Shift.name: <Compendium>
spell->Plane Shift.target: 1 bereitwillige Kreatur oder bis zu 8 bereitwillige Kreaturen, die sich bei den Händen nehmen

action->Alien Presence.name: Alien Presence
action->Alien Presence.description:
90 feet. A creature that first enters the area must attempt a @Check[will|dc:42] save.

Regardless of the result of the saving throw, the creature is temporarily immune to the Veksciralenix's Alien Presence for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute.

action->Attack of Opportunity (Jaws Only.name:
<Compendium> tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.hFtNbo1LKYCoDy2O]
Attack of Opportunity (Jaws Only)
action->Attack of Opportunity (Jaws Only.description:
tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.hFtNbo1LKYCoDy2O]

Jaws only

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

action->Second Chance.name: Second Chance
action->Second Chance.description:
Frequency three times per day

Trigger Veksciralenix or a creature that Veksciralenix can see attempts a check and learns the results

Effect The triggering creature rerolls the triggering check and takes the second result.

action->Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
action->Breath Weapon.description:
The time dragon breathes in one of two ways.

The dragon can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

Storm The dragon breathes a burst of lightning in a @Template[cone|distance:50] that deals @Damage[20d6[electricity]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:42|basic|name:Storm Breath|options:area-effect] save).

Time Displacement (arcane, transmutation) The dragon breathes a time storm. Each creature within a @Template[cone|distance:50] must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:42|name:Time Displacement Breath|traits:transmutation] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 4}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 6}.

action->Draconic Frenzy.name: Draconic Frenzy
action->Draconic Frenzy.description: Veksciralenix makes two claw Strikes and one wing Strike in any order.

action->Draconic Momentum.name: Draconic Momentum
action->Draconic Momentum.description: Veksciralenix recharges their Breath Weapon whenever they score a critical hit with a Strike.

spell->Light.target: 1 Gegenstand von maximal 1 Last, den entweder niemand oder du oder ein bereitwilliger Verbündeter mit sich führt

weapon->Dagger.name: Dolch
weapon->Dagger.description: Diese kleine Klingenwaffe wird in einer Hand gehalten und kann benutzt werden, um im Nahkampf nach einer Kreatur zu stechen. Sie kann auch geworfen werden.

armor->Studded Leather Armor.name: Studded Leather Armor
armor->Studded Leather Armor.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.

equipment->Poisoner's Staff.name: Poisoner's Staff
equipment->Poisoner's Staff.description:
This gnarled staff is covered with thorns and coated with a glistening lacquer that acts as a minor irritant. While holding the staff, you aren't affected by its coating or thorns, and you reduce the DC of your flat checks to overcome persistent poison damage from 15 to 13.

Activate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell}

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

  • Cantrips @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.QqxwHeYEVylkYjsO]{Detect Poison}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DYdvMZ8G2LiSLVWw]{Spider Sting}

action->Venom Explosion.name: Venom Explosion
action->Venom Explosion.description:
Trigger The venom mage is reduced to 0 Hit Points

Effect The venom mage explodes into a cloud of poison within a @Template[burst|distance:20]. The venom mage then reforms at a point they choose within the burst, avoids being knocked out, and remains at 1 Hit Point. The venom mage's wounded value increases by 1 when they use this ability, and they can't use this ability when they're wounded 3 or more. Creatures other than the venom mage within the burst must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success No effect.

Success The creature is sickened 1.

Failure The creature is sickened 2 and cannot recover from the sickened condition while within 20 feet of the venom mage.

Critical Failure As failure, but sickened 4.

action->Steady Spellcasting.name: Steady Spellcasting
action->Steady Spellcasting.description: If another creature's reaction would disrupt the venom mage's spellcasting action, the venom mage attempts a @Check[flat|dc:15] check. If the venom mage succeeds, their action isn't disrupted.

shield->Steel Shield.description:
tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Yr9yCuJiAlFh3QEB]

Like wooden shields, steel shields come in a variety of shapes and sizes. Though more expensive than wooden shields, they are much more durable.

Hardness HP BT
5 20 10

armor->Chain Shirt.description:
tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.MPcM4Wt6KmWE2kGL]

Sometimes called a hauberk, this is a long shirt constructed of the same metal rings as chainmail. However, it is much lighter than chainmail and protects only the torso, upper arms, and upper legs of its wearer.

action->Bullyrag Beatdown.name: Bullyrag Beatdown
action->Bullyrag Beatdown.description: Whenever the gang tough makes a successful melee Strike against a frightened creature, the Strike deals an extra weapon die of damage.

action->Frightening Critical.name: Frightening Critical
action->Frightening Critical.description: When the gang tough's Strike with a bludgeoning weapon is a critical hit and deals damage, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

0.text: When the gang tough's Strike with a bludgeoning weapon is a critical hit and deals damage, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

action->Scraping Clamor.name: Scraping Clamor
action->Scraping Clamor.description:
The Washboard Dog scrapes their weapon up and down their washboard shield, making such a clatter that it's hard to hear anything over the din. Until the beginning of the Washboard Dog tough's next turn, all creatures within 30 feet gain a +1 circumstance bonus to any saves to resist auditory spells or abilities.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.wcNGbhwn3AuamtsX]{Effect: Scraping Clamor}

Water Elemental Vessel.name: Water Elemental Vessel
Water Elemental Vessel.publicNotes: Spellcasters create elemental vessels by harvesting raw elemental energy and then binding it within a specially enchanted magic circle to grant it life.

action->Spell Circle.name: Spell Circle
action->Spell Circle.description: By performing an hour-long ritual, an elemental vessel can form a spell circle with an arcane or primal spellcaster. After the spell circle is formed, other spellcasters can join the spell circle by performing the same hour-long ritual while assisted by at least one spellcaster already in the spell circle. Each member of the spell circle must contribute at least one spell to the elemental vessel. The spellcaster permanently loses access to a spell slot equal to the spell's rank and the elemental vessel adds the contributed spell to its list of arcane innate spells (regardless of the spell's original type). An elemental vessel can be imbued with no more than three spells per spell rank. If the elemental vessel is destroyed, all members of the spell circle regain the spell slots they contributed to the creature. The arcane innate spells shown below represent a typical spell list for an elemental vessel, but each elemental vessel is likely to have different spells depending on what its spell circle has contributed.

action->Dispel Vulnerability.name: Dispel Vulnerability
action->Dispel Vulnerability.description: Whenever a creature successfully counteracts one of its spells, the vessel permanently loses access to that spell and takes damage equal to 4 × the spell's rank. The spell circle member who contributed that spell regains access to their contributed spell slot.

action->Inhabit Vessel.name: Inhabit Vessel
action->Inhabit Vessel.description: Any member of the elemental vessel's spell circle can spend 3 actions to mentally inhabit the vessel for 1 round. While they inhabit the vessel, the inhabiter controls the vessel's actions, and the vessel uses the inhabiter's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma modifiers for all checks. Only one creature can inhabit an elemental vessel at a time.

action->Engulf.description:
tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.zU3Ovaet4xQ5Gmvy]

@Check[reflex|dc:35] save, no damage, [[/act escape dc=35]], Rupture 28

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Engulf]

action->Internal Spell Strike.name: Internal Spell Strike
action->Internal Spell Strike.description: The elemental vessel targets an engulfed creature with one of its spells. The spell must have a range of touch.

action->Push 10 feet.name:
<Compendium> tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.t6cx9FOODmeZQNYl]

Push 10 feet

Waxworks Onslaught Trap.name: Waxworks Onslaught Trap
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.description: Four huge tubs containing congealed wax, enchanted to melt and envelop unwary intruders, each sit atop a cold fire.
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:43|name:Drain Wax from a Tub|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to drain the wax from a tub or @Check[athletics|dc:45|name:Push Through Wax|traits:action:force-open] (master) to push through the wax blocking a sealed door and escape (other creatures must push their own way through, as the wax reseals)
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.hpDetails: to destroy a tub and prevent it from making any further attacks; Door Seal Hardness 18; Door Seal HP 72 (BT 36) to destroy the wax on a sealed door and allow anyone to escape through the door
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.reset: The trap deactivates and resets after 1 hour. At that time, the wax in the tubs cools and congeals, and any wax elsewhere in the room magically goes back into the tubs.
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.routine: (4 actions) The trap loses 1 action each turn per drained or destroyed tub. On each action, a different tub spews hot wax at a random creature in the room, dealing @Damage[3d12[fire]|options:area-damage] damage to the target and all adjacent creatures (@Check[reflex|dc:35|basic|options:area-effect] save). On a failure or critical failure, the creature is also encased in hot wax. A creature that starts its turn encased in wax takes @Damage[8d12[fire]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it [[/act escape dc=35]]{Escapes} the hardening wax. Each turn it remains encased, the damage dealt by the hot wax decreases by 2d12 but the DC to Escape increases by 2 (minimum 0 damage, maximum DC 43). A creature that can't get free from the wax might suffocate.

action->Seal Room.name: Seal Room
action->Seal Room.description:
Trigger A creature comes within 5 feet of a tub

Effect The fires beneath the vats blaze to life, magically melting the wax in the tubs. The tubs emit gouts of wax over the room's exits, sealing them shut. The trap then rolls initiative.

equipment->Key to the Skinsaw Sanctum Va.name: Key to the Skinsaw Sanctum Vault

action->Bloody Sneak Attack.name:
<Compendium> tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.AWvNPE4U0kEJSL1T]
Bloody Sneak Attack
action->Bloody Sneak Attack.description:
tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.AWvNPE4U0kEJSL1T]

Any creature taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against the Skinner's attacks. When attacking an off-guard creature, the Skinner deals an additional 2d6 precision damage.

action->Chain Expert.name: Chain Expert
action->Chain Expert.description: The Skinner can effectively wield abnormally long spiked chains and can do so using only one hand.

action->Chain Up.name: Chain Up
action->Chain Up.description:
Requirements The Skinner has an adjacent creature grabbed with her spiked chain

Effect The Skinner attempts an @Check[athletics|defense:reflex] check against the grabbed creature's Reflex save DC. On a success, the Skinner knots her chain around the grabbed creature, which becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} (Escape DC = 10 + the result of the Skinner's Athletics check); on a critical success, the creature also falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Regardless of whether the Skinner succeeds, she drops the chain.

action->Flay.name: Flay
action->Flay.description: Whenever the Skinner makes a successful cleaver Strike against a grabbed creature, she also deals @Damage[1d6[bleed]] (or @Damage[2d6[bleed]] on a critical hit).

action->Hook and Flay.name: Hook and Flay
action->Hook and Flay.description:
Requirements The Skinner has a creature grabbed with her spiked chain

Effect The Skinner pulls the creature into the nearest open adjacent square and makes a cleaver Strike against the creature.

weapon->+2 Greater Striking Longsword.name: +2 Langschwert des Starken Schadens
weapon->+2 Greater Striking Longsword.description: Langschwerter können ein oder zweischneidig sein. Ihre Klingen sind schwer und 0,90-1,20 m lang.

armor->+2 Resilient Full Plate.name: +2 Ritterrüstung des Widerstandes
armor->+2 Resilient Full Plate.description: Plate mail consists of interlocking plates that encase nearly the entire body in a carapace of steel. It is costly and heavy, and the wearer often requires help to don it correctly, but it provides some of the best defense armor can supply. A suit of this armor comes with an undercoat of padded armor (see below) and a pair of gauntlets.

equipment->Ring of Sustenance.name: Ring of Sustenance
equipment->Ring of Sustenance.description: This polished wooden ring constantly refreshes your body and mind. You don't need to eat or drink while wearing it, and you need only 2 hours of sleep per day to gain the benefits of 8 hours of sleep. A ring of sustenance doesn't function until it's been worn and invested continuously for a week. Removing it resets this interval.

consumable->Whisper Briolette.name: Flüsterpendeloque
consumable->Whisper Briolette.description:
Aktivierung 1 Vorstellung

Anforderungen Du verfügst über den Kompetenzgrad Experte in Heimlichkeit

Dieser tränenförmige Edelstein ist mit dreieckigen Facetten übersät und wirkt elegant und teuer, wenngleich er sich bei genauerem Hinsehen als hohl erweist. Wird der Talisman aktiviert, kannst du augenblicklich eine bis zu 1 Minute gesprochene Nachricht (in etwa 150 Wörter) telepathisch an beliebige Kreaturen innerhalb einer Reichweite von 30 m übermitteln. Du kannst diese telepathische Nachricht an Kreaturen übermitteln, die du wahrnehmen kannst oder die vor dir @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Versteckt} sind, nicht jedoch an Kreaturen, die dir gegenüber den Zustand @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Unentdeckt} haben. Einmal benutzt, wird die Flüsterpendeloque unbrauchbar und verschwindet allmählich innerhalb der nächsten Minuten, anstatt einfach zu Staub zu zerfallen.

action->Attack of Opportunity.name: Attack of Opportunity
action->Attack of Opportunity.description:
Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

action->Tactical Aura.name: Tactical Aura
action->Tactical Aura.description: 60 feet. Allies of lower level than Wynsal in the aura gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.hFtNbo1LKYCoDy2O]{Attack of Opportunity} reaction. Allies who already have the Attack of Opportunity reaction can use it when a creature within their reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to normal triggers, and they disrupt a triggering concentrate action on a critical hit.

action->Demanding Orders.name: Demanding Orders
action->Demanding Orders.description: Wynsal commands his allies to take action. Allies within 120 feet who hear and understand his order are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened 1} for 1 round and can use this extra action to Stride, Strike, or Step.

action->Determination.name: Determination
action->Determination.description: Wynsal either ends a nonpermanent condition affecting him or counteracts a nonpermanent spell affecting him (counteract rank 17th, counteract check [[/r 1d20+30 #Counteract]]{+30}). This doesn't remove Hit Point damage or prevent the spell or effect from affecting others. It can't remove an ongoing affliction or conditions from a situation outside his control (such as being grappled or flanked).

action->Formation Attack.name: Formation Attack
action->Formation Attack.description: Wynsal deals 3d8 extra damage to any creature that's within reach of at least two of his allies.

action->Hampering Strike.name: Hampering Strike
action->Hampering Strike.description: A foe that takes damage from Wynsal's melee Strike is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round. If it's already slowed, the value of the slowed condition increases by 1.

action->Consume Flesh.name: Consume Flesh
action->Consume Flesh.description:
Requirements The ghoul is adjacent to the corpse of an evil or chaotic creature that died within the last hour.

Effect The ghoul devours a chunk of the corpse and regains @Damage[6d6[healing]] Hit Points. It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once.

action->Ghoul Fever.name: Ghoul Fever
action->Ghoul Fever.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:27]

Stage 1 carrier with no ill effect (1 day)

Stage 2 @Damage[2d6[void]] damage and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1 day)

Stage 3 as stage 2 (1 day)

Stage 4 @Damage[2d6[void]] damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day)

Stage 5 as stage 4 (1 day)

Stage 6 dead, and rises as a zeal-damned ghoul the next midnight.

action->Paralysis.name: Paralysis
action->Paralysis.description: Any living, non-elf creature hit by a ghoul's attack must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:27] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

action->Swift Leap.name: Swift Leap
action->Swift Leap.description: The ghoul jumps up to half its Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

spell->Veil.name: Schleier
spell->Veil.description:
Du verkleidest die Ziele als andere Kreaturen mit derselben Körperform sowie ungefähr gleicher Größe (15 cm Spielraum) und Gewicht (50 Pfd. Spielraum). Die Verkleidung kann die Identitäten der Ziele verbergen oder sie als einer anderen Abstammung angehörig erscheinen lassen. Sie ist jedoch nicht präzise genug, um bestimmte Individuen nachzuahmen. Der Zauber verändert Stimme, Geruch oder typische Gesten nicht. Du wählst für jedes Ziel eine Verkleidung aus (du könntest z.B. ein Ziel als Elf und ein anderes als Zwerg erscheinen lassen).

Das Wirken von Schleier gilt als Verkleiden hinsichtlich der gleichnamigen Aktion. Es erlaubt es einem Ziel, alle Situationsmali zu ignorieren, die sie durch eine Verkleidung als unähnliche Kreatur erhalten würden. Der Zauber verleiht den Zielen einen Zustandsbonus von +4 auf Täuschungswürfe, um andere Kreaturen daran zu hindern, die Verkleidungen zu durchschauen. Die Ziele fügen außerdem ihre Stufe hinzu, auch wenn sie Ungeübt sein sollten. Du kannst eine oder alle Verkleidungen aufheben.

Erhöhung (5.) Der Zauber verändert außerdem die Stimmen und Gerüche der Ziele. Er gehört zur Kategorie Hörbar und Riechbar.

Erhöhung (7.) Die Ziele können als beliebige Kreaturen derselben Größe erscheinen, sogar als bestimmte Individuen. Du musst ein Individuum gesehen haben, um dessen Aussehen zu reproduzieren. Der Zauber verändert außerdem die Stimmen und Gerüche der Ziele. Er gehört zur Kategorie Hörbar und Riechbar.

spell->Geas (Ritual).name: <Compendium> (Ritual)
spell->Geas (Ritual).target: 1 Kreatur mit einer Stufe, die nicht höher sein als darf als der doppelte Zaubergrad von Geas

weapon->+1 Striking Morningstar.name: +1 Morgenstern des Schadens
weapon->+1 Striking Morningstar.description: Diese Waffe hat einen kurzen Schaft, welcher in einer Metallkugel mit Stacheln endet.

weapon->Sling.name: Schleuder
weapon->Sling.description: Dies ist eigentlich kaum mehr als eine Lederschale, an welcher ein paar Schnüre befestigt sind. Eine Schleuder kann benutzt werden, um Kugeln oder glatte Steine aus einiger Entfernung zu schleudern.

armor->Breastplate.name: Breastplate
armor->Breastplate.description: Though referred to as a breastplate, this type of armor consists of several pieces of plate or half-plate armor that protect the torso, chest, neck, and sometimes the hips and lower legs. It strategically grants some of the protection of plate while allowing greater flexibility and speed.

consumable->Sling Bullets.name: Schleuderkugeln
consumable->Sling Bullets.description: Diese kleinen Metallkugeln bestehen aus Eisen oder Blei und sind dazu gedacht, als Munition für Schleudern zu dienen.

action->Little Favors.name: Little Favors
action->Little Favors.description: Each time a creature willingly performs a service, quest, or task for the zealborn, the creature takes a cumulative -1 status penalty to saving throws against the zealborn's mental spells and abilities (maximum -4).

action->Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
action->Rejuvenation.description: When a zealborn is destroyed, it re-forms, fully healed, near a follower of its choice in [[/gmr 1d10 #days]]{1d10 days}. For the purposes of rejuvenation, a follower is defined as an intelligent creature who's well acquainted with the zealborn and is a true believer in the zealborn's mission, not merely a lukewarm supporter. A zealborn can be permanently destroyed only if they have no current followers or can be convinced to end their own life.

action->Zealous Restoration.name: Zealous Restoration
action->Zealous Restoration.description: A zealborn can't regain Hit Points through resting or void healing; they feed only on the idealism of their supporters, regaining 10 Hit Points per day for each creature under the effects of a geas cast by the zealborn. Creatures under a zealborn's geas have their maximum HP reduced by 10 each day until they are burned away to a husk and perish. After 24 hours, such creatures rise as zeal-damned ghouls under the zealborn's control. Zeal-damned ghouls eat only the flesh of evil or chaotic creatures and deal an additional 1d6 spirit and 1d6 void damage with their attacks.

action->Dubious Shifting.name: Dubious Shifting
action->Dubious Shifting.description:
The zrukbat assumes the shape of any Small object or ornamentation, although the zrukbat's mimicked objects usually have unrealistic or suspicious quirks.

This doesn't change the zrukbat's size but can alter their coloration and visual appearance.

They have an automatic result of 23 on Deception checks and DCs to pass as the mimicked object.

action->Go for the Eyes.name: Go for the Eyes
action->Go for the Eyes.description:
The zrukbat flies up to its Speed and makes a claw Strike at the end of its move.

If the claw attack hits, the target must succeed on a @Check[fortitude|dc:15] saving throw or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round (or blinded for 1 minute on a critical failure). If the Strike was a critical hit, the target's save result is one degree of success worse.

folders.Book 5 - Belly of the Black Whale: Kapitel 5 - Im Bauch des Schwarzen Wals
